src:
Hasil Fuzhou China open 2019: 4 Wakil ke Perempat Final, 3 Kandas
07 Nov 2019, 14:33 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Empat wakil Indonesia lolos ke babak perempat final turnamen bulu tangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019. Tiga wakil lainnya kandas di babak kedua yang digelar di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Fuzhou, Cina, Kamis.
Wakil tunggal putra yang lolos adalah Jonatan Christie yang akrab disapa Jojo. Ia menyingkirkan pebulu tangkis asal Hong Kong Lee Cheuk Yiu dengan skor 21-8, 12-21, 21-14.
Kemudian ada dua wakil ganda putra yang melaju adalah yaitu unggulan pertama Marcus Fernaldi Gideon/Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo dan unggulan kedua Mohammad Ahsan/Hendra Setiawan.
Marcus/Kevin menumbangkan pasangan China He Ji Ting/Tan Qiang dengan skor 16-21, 21-11, 21-16. Sedangkan Ahsan/Hendra mengalahkan Ou Xuan Yi/Zhang Nan yang juga berasal dari Cina dengan skor 11-21, 21-18, 30-29.
Lalu, satu wakil ganda campuran Praveen Jordan/ Melati Daeva Oktavianti yang menundukkan pasangan suami-istri asal Inggris Chris Adcock/Gabrielle Adcock dalam dua game dengan kedudukan 21-11, 21-13.
Sementara itu, tiga wakil Tim Garuda yang tidak dapat melanjutkan ke babak perempat final, yakni tunggal putri Gregoria Mariska Tunjung yang takluk di tangan unggulan pertama asal Taiwan dengan skor 19-21, 17-21.
Selanjutnya, ganda putra Fajar Alfian/Muhammad Rian Ardianto yang kalah dari pasangan Malaysia Aaron Chia/Soh Wooi Yik dengan skor 21-13, 18-21, 16-21, serta ganda campuran Rinov Rivaldy/Pitha Haningtyas Mentari yang dihentikan oleh wakil Malaysia Goh Soon Huat/Lai Shevon Jemie dengan skor 21-23, 13-21.
Pertandingan babak perempat final turnamen bulu tangkis Fuzhou Open 2019 akan diselenggarakan pada Jumat, 8 November, mulai pukul 12.00 waktu Fuzhou atau sekitar pukul 11.00 WIB.
text:
Fuzhou China Open 2019 results: 4 representatives to quarter-finals, 3 Kandas
Nov. 7, 2019, 14:33 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Four Indonesian representatives qualified for the quarter-finals of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 badminton tournament. The other three representatives ran aground in the second round held at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Fuzhou, China on Thursday.
The only male representative who escaped was Jonatan Christie, who is familiarly called Jojo. He got rid of badminton pebulu from Hong Kong Lee Cheuk Yiu with a score of 21-8, 12-21, 21-14.
Then there were two men's doubles representatives who went forward, namely first seed Marcus Fernaldi Gideon / Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo and second seed Mohammad Ahsan / Hendra Setiawan.
Marcus / Kevin overthrew Chinese couple He Ji Ting / Tan Qiang with a score of 16-21, 21-11, 21-16. While Ahsan / Hendra defeated Ou Xuan Yi / Zhang Nan who also came from China with a score of 11-21, 21-18, 30-29.
Then, a mixed representative of Praveen Jordan / Melati Daeva Oktavianti who beat British husband and wife Chris Adcock / Gabrielle Adcock in two games with a position of 21-11, 21-13.
Meanwhile, three Garuda Team representatives who were unable to proceed to the quarter-finals, namely the women's singles Gregoria Mariska Tunjung who was defeated by the first seed from Taiwan with a score of 19-21, 17-21.
Furthermore, the men's doubles of Fajar Alfian / Muhammad Rian Ardianto who lost to Malaysian pair Aaron Chia / Soh Wooi Yik with a score of 21-13, 18-21, 16-21, as well as the mixed doubles Rinov Rivaldy / Pitha Haningtyas Mentari were stopped by Malaysian representative Goh Soon Huat / Lai Shevon Jemie with a score of 21-23, 13-21.
The quarter-final match of the Fuzhou Open 2019 badminton tournament will be held on Friday, November 8, starting at 12.00 Fuzhou time or around 11.00 WIB.
